tool_description: Generates comprehensive security policies and procedures required for PCI DSS compliance based on organizational requirements and compliance standards.

organization_name.description: Name of the organization for which policies are being generated.

business_type.description: Type of business: merchant, service-provider, or payment-processor.

policy_categories.description: Categories of policies to generate (access-control, data-protection, network-security, etc.).

compliance_level.description: Required PCI compliance level: level-1, level-2, level-3, or level-4.

employee_count.description: Number of employees in the organization (1-50000).

include_templates.description: Whether to include policy implementation templates.

regulatory_requirements.description: Additional regulatory requirements to incorporate (GDPR, CCPA, SOX, etc.).

error_messages: Invalid business type: Use 'merchant', 'service-provider', or 'payment-processor' for business_type parameter.
Invalid compliance level: Use 'level-1', 'level-2', 'level-3', or 'level-4' for compliance_level parameter.
Empty policy categories: Provide at least one policy category in the policy_categories array.
Employee count out of range: employee_count must be between 1 and 50000.
Invalid review frequency: review_frequency_months must be between 3 and 12 months.
Policy generation failed: Unable to generate policies due to invalid configuration parameters.
Template generation error: Policy templates could not be created due to missing requirements.
usage: Provide organization details, business type, required policy categories, and PCI compliance level. Optionally specify employee count, template inclusion, additional regulatory requirements, and review frequency. The tool generates comprehensive security policies tailored to PCI DSS requirements.

generated_policies.description: List of generated policy document names and locations

policy_coverage_score.description: Percentage of PCI DSS requirements covered by generated policies (0-100)

training_requirements.description: List of required training programs for policy implementation

next_review_date.description: Scheduled date for next policy review
